question: There are {n1} periods in the day for a normal student but {name} has to take {n2} extra classes. Each class is {t} minutes long, but he spends {tt} minutes before each class to review the study materials and prepare. He goes to class for {d} days a week. He then spends a fraction of {frac} of his weekly minutes each on Saturday and Sunday as extra learning time. How many hours a week does he spend learning?
